name: microtonal-utils
description: a library for calculating with microtonal intervals and notes

scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:parser
scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && browserify lib/index.js -s microtonal_utils --debug | exorcist dist/microtonal-utils.js.map > dist/microtonal-utils.js
scripts.build:min: mkdir -p dist && browserify lib/index.js -s microtonal_utils -g uglifyify --debug | exorcist dist/microtonal-utils.min.js.map > dist/microtonal-utils.min.js
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:min

author: Matthew Yacavone
